subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Cody Ross homered twice, tying the game with a two-run shot in the seventh and giving Boston the lead with two outs in the ninth to snap a five-game losing streak with a win over Minnesota.
snippet: Cody Ross homered twice, tying the game with a two-run shot in the seventh and giving Boston the lead with two outs in the ninth to snap a five-game losing streak with a win over Minnesota.
